text: Kɔnɔ mangɛ Dawuda naxa a fala Arawuna bɛ, «Ade, n wama a sarafe nɛ kɔbiri ra naxan lanma sɛriyɛ ki ma. N mu se bama sɛrɛxɛ ra Alatala bɛ, naxan mu kelima n yɛtɛ harige ma. N mu nɔma sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi bade n mu naxan sare baxi.» Na kui Dawuda naxa Arawuna xa lonyi nun a xa ningee sara gbeti kilo tongo suuli ra.
